description:
Keep the chaos under control in this soft long sleeved jersey. Sombrio uses fancy materials and a bit of science to help keep little rippers cool, lap, after lap.

  • Wicking material with a cooling xylitol treatment that cools down when wet
  • Antimicrobial treatment means more riding and less washing
  • Raglan sleeves give you unrestricted range of motion
  • Single zippered side pocket
name: Sombrio Grom's Chaos Long Sleeve 2 Jersey - Youths
